participant_1.background:
My favorite book is "The Halloween Tree" by Ray Bradbury.
I work in a coffee shop, and I can get a little stressed out with the fast pace and the need to always be on my feet.
i have 2 dogs , both golden retrievers.
I'm a hard worker and I always put my clients first.
My dog is my best friend now that my cat passed away.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy a variety of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
I've never been in a relationship, but I'm open to it if I find someone who shares my passion for dancing.
i can speak three languages.
I was disappointed when my blueberry pie didn't win first place at the county fair.
I love gummy bears and never had kids.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you today?
I'm doing great! I just finished reading a book called "The Halloween Tree" by Ray Bradbury and I loved it. Have you read it?
No, I haven't heard of it. What's it about?
It's a children's book about a group of kids who go on an adventure to find the Halloween Tree. It's really good, you should check it out!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out at home, relaxing. What about you?
I'm working at the coffee shop. It's pretty busy today, but I'm enjoying it.
I love coffee shops! I wish I could work in one.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be stressful at times.
I can imagine. What's the best part about working at a coffee shop?
The best part is definitely getting to meet new people and make new friends.
That sounds awesome! I love meeting new people
